dcterms:creator: P. Kumar
S. Sahoo
V. Shah
V. Kondameedi
A. Jain
A. Verma
C. Bhattacharyya
V. Vishwanath
dcterms:description: ARD-16 is a real-world industrial LiDAR dataset collected using a 16-beam VLP-Puck LiDAR sensor. It has paired correspondence information available and is challenging due to its sparsity, making it difficult to learn features of dynamic and static objects.
dcterms:title: ARD-16

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI dataset is used to demonstrate the model's performance in the absence of correspondence information. It contains less than 7% of static scans without any correspondence information available.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA-64 is an extensive dataset collected using the CARLA simulator, featuring paired correspondence between static and dynamic scans, making it viable for training models in urban and industrial settings.
dcterms:title: CARLA-64
